SEARCH
Package org.example.library.services

Class CDService

java.lang.Object
org.example.library.services.CDService
public class CDService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing CD operations in the library system. This includes:
  • Adding new CDs to the database
  • Retrieving CDs
  • Borrowing CDs (7-day loan)
  • Detecting overdue CDs and applying fines (Strategy Pattern)
  • Calculating total CD fines for a specific user
This class interacts with FileDatabase, and applies CDFineStrategy for overdue fine calculation.

  • Constructor Details

    • CDService

      public CDService()

  • Method Details

    • addCD

      public void addCD(CD cd)
      Adds a new CD to the JSON database. Fields initialized:
      • borrowed = false
      • dueDate = null
      • fine = 0
      Parameters:
      cd - CD object to be stored

    • getAllCDs

      public List<CD> getAllCDs()
      Retrieves all CDs stored in the database.
      Returns:
      list of CD objects

    • borrowCD

      public void borrowCD(String id, User currentUser)
      Allows a user to borrow a CD for 7 days. Updates:
      • quantity--
      • available = false (if quantity reaches 0)
      • borrowed = true
      • borrowedBy = user's ID
      • dueDate = today + 7 days
      Prints messages for:
      • CD not available
      • CD already borrowed
      • CD not found
      Parameters:
      id - CD identifier
      currentUser - user borrowing the CD

    • checkOverdueCDs

      public void checkOverdueCDs()
      Checks all CDs to determine whether they are overdue. If overdue:
      • Fine is calculated using CDFineStrategy
      • Fine is stored in database
      Criteria:
      • borrowed == true
      • dueDate exists
      • daysLate > 0

    • getTotalCdFineForUser

      public double getTotalCdFineForUser(int userId)
      Computes the total CD fines for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID to lookup
      Returns:
      total fine value in double
